name: Untitled Mushroom Game
description:
A "game" about growing mushrooms with limited amounts of programmer art.

Entry for the Brackeys Gamejam 2023.1 with the theme "An end is a new beginning"

Made by me, alone again :(
Far from finished because I kinda just wanna play WoW instead lol. But there is some stuff in here that I'm pretty happy with.

Soundeffects licensed under CC-BY 3.0. Found via opengameart, for links to the uploads see https://github.com/Toreole/BrackeysGameJam_23_1/blob/main/Assets/SFX/license.txt
